result.name: The Exome Aggregation Consortium (ExAC) v0.3
result.description: The Exome Aggregation Consortium (ExAC) is a coalition of investigators seeking to aggregate and harmonize exome sequencing data from a variety of large-scale sequencing projects, and to make summary data available for the wider scientific community.
result.center: The Eli and Edythe L. Broad Institute of Harvard and MIT
